name: pangolin
description: Pangolin is a self-hosted, lightweight URL shortener with analytics and custom redirects. It includes a clean web interface and link management features for private or team use.
features: URL shortening: Create short, memorable links from long URLs with custom aliases or auto-generated codes
Click analytics: Track link performance with detailed metrics including click counts, referrers, geographic data, and device info
Custom redirects: Configure advanced redirect rules including time-based, geographic, or device-specific routing
Link management: Organize and manage all shortened URLs from centralized dashboard with search and filtering
QR code generation: Automatically generate QR codes for shortened links to enable mobile scanning and offline sharing
Link expiration: Set expiration dates on links for time-sensitive campaigns or temporary access control
Password protection: Add password requirements to shortened links for secure sharing of sensitive content
API access: RESTful API enables programmatic link creation and management for integration with other tools
Custom domains: Use your own domain names for branded short links that maintain identity and build trust
Team collaboration: Multi-user support with role-based permissions for team-based link management and analytics
